content: you will love the softness of these cute washcloths make them for yourself or someone you love *note if you would like a tighter gauge feel free to go down in hook sizes until you find a gauge you like and increase your beginning chain the stitch pattern will work as long as your beg chain is an odd number * click here 1 to watch a video on how to do a reverse single_crochet crab stitch ***errata row 1 should end with single_crochet in last chain chain 1 turn 21 sts row 2 should read 1 single_crochet and 1 double_crochet in next *double_crochet* and will also end with 21 sts the pdf file has been corrected as of 08/09/08*** 1 http //www youtube com/watch v=jhsbycwfpdo
